channel.title: Flames, torches removal... Help.. :'(
channel.description: Yes.. I Have searched thuroughly... no results.. please help me out here i need to remove those 2 torch things.. with the runescape word also. Ty for any consideration

item.title: Flames, torches removal... Help.. :'(
item.dc:creator: @hypercomps hypercomps
item.description:
@hypercomps wrote:

I removed the code you said for flames and got this after compiling

client.java:11734: cannot find symbol symbol : method method58(int) location: class client method58(25106); ^ client.java:11735: cannot find symbol symbol : method method58(int) location: class client method58(25106); ^ [br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 21, 2009, 02:58:29 am[/size][hr]Okay, just incase another noober like me is looking on how to do this and isn’t looking to spend 30 minutes looking for a solution here it is. Rep me? haha up to you kids!
Search in Client.java and delete the following

[code] {
int l3 = j3;
int j4 = 256 - j3;
j3 = anIntArray850[j3];
int l4 = aClass15_1110.anIntArray315[j1];
aClass15_1110.anIntArray315[j1++] = ((j3 & 0xff00ff) * l3 + (l4 & 0xff00ff) * j4 & 0xff00ff00) + ((j3 & 0xff00) * l3 + (l4 & 0xff00) * j4 & 0xff0000) >> 8;
} else

[/code]
Search and delete …

{ int i5 = k4; int j5 = 256 - k4; k4 = anIntArray850[k4]; int k5 = aClass15_1111.anIntArray315[j1]; aClass15_1111.anIntArray315[j1++] = ((k4 & 0xff00ff) * i5 + (k5 & 0xff00ff) * j5 & 0xff00ff00) + ((k4 & 0xff00) * i5 + (k5 & 0xff00) * j5 & 0xff0000) >> 8; } else

Enjoy!

item.title: Flames, torches removal... Help.. :'(
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Mott_xX Xx Mott xX
item.description:
@Xx_Mott_xX wrote:

To Remove Runescape Logo
Go Into Client.java and search “Logo”

You will see:

class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(aClass44_1053, "logo", 0);

Change the 0 on the end to a 1 Save and Compile try it out.

Now for the Flames, Go into Client.Java in Client Folder, Search for Method58

Looks like this:

[code]public final void method58(int i)
{
char c = ‘\u0100’;
for(int j = 10; j < 117; j++)
{
int k = (int)(Math.random() * 100D);
if(k < 50)
anIntArray828[j + (c - 2 << 7)] = 255;
}

    if(i != 25106)
        method6();
    for(int l = 0; l < 100; l++)
    {
        int i1 = (int)(Math.random() * 124D) + 2;
        int k1 = (int)(Math.random() * 128D) + 128;
        int k2 = i1 + (k1 << 7);
        anIntArray828[k2] = 192;
    }

    for(int j1 = 1; j1 < c - 1; j1++)
    {
        for(int l1 = 1; l1 < 127; l1++)
        {
            int l2 = l1 + (j1 << 7);
            anIntArray829[l2] = (anIntArray828[l2 - 1] + anIntArray828[l2 + 1] + anIntArray828[l2 - 128] + anIntArray828[l2 + 128]) / 4;
        }

    }

    anInt1275 += 128;
    if(anInt1275 > anIntArray1190.length)
    {
        anInt1275 -= anIntArray1190.length;
        int i2 = (int)(Math.random() * 12D);
        method106(aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub2Array1152[i2], -135);
    }
    for(int j2 = 1; j2 < c - 1; j2++)
    {
        for(int i3 = 1; i3 < 127; i3++)
        {
            int k3 = i3 + (j2 << 7);
            int i4 = anIntArray829[k3 + 128] - anIntArray1190[k3 + anInt1275 & anIntArray1190.length - 1] / 5;
            if(i4 < 0)
                i4 = 0;
            anIntArray828[k3] = i4;
        }

    }

    for(int j3 = 0; j3 < c - 1; j3++)
        anIntArray969[j3] = anIntArray969[j3 + 1];

    anIntArray969[c - 1] = (int)(Math.sin((double)anInt1161 / 14D) * 16D + Math.sin((double)anInt1161 / 15D) * 14D + Math.sin((double)anInt1161 / 16D) * 12D);
    if(anInt1040 > 0)
        anInt1040 -= 4;
    if(anInt1041 > 0)
        anInt1041 -= 4;
    if(anInt1040 == 0 && anInt1041 == 0)
    {
        int l3 = (int)(Math.random() * 2000D);
        if(l3 == 0)
            anInt1040 = 1024;
        if(l3 == 1)
            anInt1041 = 1024;
    }
}[/code]

Delete everything and make it look like this.

public final void method58(int i) { }

Not Made By Me, Gold Light Deserves Credits For This From Silabsoft. 100% By Him

item.title: Flames, torches removal... Help.. :'(
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“adventurescape, post:2, topic:279219”]i think you gotta go in client and type ctrl+f together at same time and search runescape.com or just runescape, it might show like a photobucket thingy with runescape at the end of link, then u can replace that with your picture (or remove the rs logo) then, u removed the rs logo, but the torches, i think there glued onto the client because there .gif files, idk how to remove those :eek:

                         ~AdventureScape[/quote]

yea… the flames are acually methods… i remember seeing someone ask how to remove before and fixed it… but i dun remember what method of file to edit for the torches

Read full topic
